contentList.content: A Paladin's oath is a sacred, binding vow. Their power a manifestation of their devotion to a just cause. To rescind one's oath would be utterly unconscionable...right?
This action will have grave consequences.

Oaths emboldened lay bare the path to preserve one's ideals.
A hammer of dawn to fall upon those deserving.
How many times you may channel the strength of your resolve into a relentless Smite.

Lay waste to your enemies.
Lay bare your conviction.

Smite your target with divine fury. This action always rolls with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>. Upon damaging a target, further <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made against the target are rolled with Advantage as well.
Affected creature has been marked by a Paladin. <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made against this creature roll with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.

Bend the will of your target with necrotic wrath. This action always rolls with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>. Upon damaging a target, they become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="UNHOLY_SUBJUGATION">Subjugated</LSTag>. Your ability to Subjugate other creatures may be toggled at any time. <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="Tooltip_Dangerous_Encounter">Dangerous</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Fatal_Encounter">Fatal</LSTag> foes cannot be Subjugated.

Affected creature will follow and fight alongside the Paladin who subjugated them.

If damaged by the Paladin or their allies, the subjugated creature will break free from the Paladin's control.

A creature may only be Subjugated if one of their allies is alive and nearby. Removed if Downed.
Evoke a heavenly flare, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDING_SMITE_BLINDED">Blinding</LSTag> your target.
Force your target to erupt in a divine glow, preventing it from turning <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>.
Affected creature sheds light in a [1] radius, preventing it from becoming <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>.
Engulf your target in divine flame, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SEARING_SMITE">Searing</LSTag> them.
Shatter your targets resolve, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STAGGERING_SMITE">Staggering</LSTag> them.

Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>, and can't take <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reactions</LSTag>.
Push your target to the brink, forcing them back by [1] and knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Destroy your targets confidence, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightening</LSTag> them.
When making an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with one of your Smites, you make your roll with a +20 bonus.

You fight on the side of light in the cosmic struggle against darkness to preserve the sanctity of life and the beauty of nature.

Breaking your oath will result in grave consequences.

Committed to preserving life, you fight on the side of the light in the cosmic struggle against darkness.

Breaking your oath will result in grave consequences.

Oath of the Ancients paladins abide by the following tenets:

Kindle the Light. Through acts of kindness, enkindle the light of hope in the bleakest hollows of despair.

Shelter the Light. Where love blooms, stand against the devilry that would snip its stem.

Preserve Your Own Light. Delight in culture and small joys to preserve the light in your own heart.

Breaking your oath will result in grave consequences.

Once per turn, upon landing a killing blow on a Fey enemy, restore one <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="WarPriestActionPoint">Crusader's Smite</LSTag> charge.
Heal yourself and all allies within [1] for [2]. Regain another [2] when the status ends.
Heal yourself and all allies within [1] for [2].
Affected creature will automatically cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_HealingRadiance">Healing Radiance</LSTag> again when this status expires.

<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="NATURES_WRATH">Restrain</LSTag> an enemy. They cannot move. <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against them have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>. Emit an aura across [1] which grants both yourself and allies <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.

You have sworn yourself to the ideals of civilisation and law, serving society to ensure it is reborn from the ashes of our mistakes.

Breaking your oath will result in grave consequences.

Teleport to an area you can see, scorching all within a [1] area with blisteringly hot flame.

Using <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_PhoenixLanding">Phoenix Landing</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SearingProtection">Searing Protection</LSTag> grants you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SUNSCORCHED">Sun Scorched</LSTag> for three turns. In addition, you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Fire damage.

The first time you are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DOWNED">Downed</LSTag> each <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>, you immediately recover all of your <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>, erupting in an uncontrollable explosion and gaining <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SUNSCORCHED">Sun Scorched</LSTag> for three turns. When you recover from being Downed in this way, you retain your <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>.
Affected creature must take a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> before they are able to self-revive again.

Following the ideal of the knight in shining armour, you act with honour and virtue to protect the weak and pursue the greater good.

Breaking your oath will result in grave consequences.

Following the ideal of the knight in shining armour, you act with honour and virtue in the pursuit of the greater good.

Breaking your oath will result in grave consequences.

Oath of Devotion paladins abide by the following tenets:

Courage. Stride dauntlessly into action.

Compassion. Show clemency when prudent, and lend your arm to those in need.

Duty. Tend your responsibilities, obey just laws, and support those entrusted to your care.

Breaking your oath will result in grave consequences.

Aggressors recieve three stacks of Radiating Orb when they damage the creature with a melee attack.

Affected weapon adds its wielders <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Charisma Modifier</LSTag> to <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Attack Rolls</LSTag>. It has become magical and emits radiant light across [1].

Oath of Vengeance paladins abide by the following tenets:

Fight the Greater Evil. Exerting your wisdom, identify the higher morality in any given instance, and fight for it.

No Mercy for the Wicked. Chasten those who dole out their villainy by wiping their blight from the world forever.

Breaking your oath will result in grave consequences.
